up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INT NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, fname VARCHAR(255), lname VARCHAR(255), active TINYINT(1), createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users_history (id INT NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, fname VARCHAR(255), lname VARCHAR(255), active TINYINT(1), createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, operation VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, version INT NOT NULL, valid_from DATETIME NOT NULL, valid_to DATETIME, modified_by VARCHAR(255), modified_at DATETIME)
